title: Kendrick Perkins | Ep 69 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Kendrick Perkins | Ep 69 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
Former NBA center and current NBA media member Kendrick Perkins joins the boys on episode 69 of a wild ALL THE SMOKE. Perkins discusses the current season including the Nets new big 3, the Shaq-Donovan Mitchell beef, and the hot starts of both Clippers and Lakers. Plus, Perkins opens up about his past beef with Kevin Durant, his run with the Celtics, his transition into the media, and shares some crazy KG stories from their time playing together.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
